metadata.description:
This is #HeybelaSessions  1/4 FT Davyd 
 
A musical movement spearheaded by HeyBela, aimed at forging powerful collaborations with producers who bring their unique sound to challenge her to rap in different rhythms.

Inspired by the collaborative spirit of the old days on Soundcloud, I teamed up with 4 different producers to do these Freestyle sessions.

But this project is more than just about creating amazing music. HeyBela intends to use her share of the proceeds to finance the creation of her first album as an artist. This is her chance to make her mark on the world of music, and she's inviting you to join her on this exciting journey.

So come on board and be part of the #HeybelaSessions movement. With your support, we can create something truly special, and usher in a new era of collaboration, creativity and culture.

- The top 5 collectors of each song will be on the Whitelist to collect the next freestyle at half price.
- The top 1 collector of each #HeyBelaSession will be able to claim the next freestyle for FREE.
- People who contributed to her crowdfund will be able to claim all 4 freestyles for FREE.
- All the collectors of the #HeybelaSessions will have access to exclusive content from the creation of the album and will be able to enter her Telegram Collectors group.
-We will send the stems to the Golden Egg winner so he/she can recreate or make their own remix of the song.

Read more here: https://mirror.xyz/0x0A032Cd1433DD23616B94F925CB6c86db6b7f073/Ojz-7D8edhBITUDse1cVTlC-n_z7FBS6eEEcYWlCdKc

About Davyd:

Born in Rio Gallegos, Argentina, this multi-talented artist is a music producer, sound designer, and skilled musician with a passion for video game soundscapes. With 10 years of experience under their belt, they have collaborated with artists from diverse musical genres and helped bring exciting game worlds to life with their sonic wizardry.

I met him in the space, he was always supporting my music and he loved my way of rapping. When he showed me his beats i was blown away by the sheer talent and creativity behind his work. I knew in an instant that he had to be the first producer to collaborate with me on the #HeybelaSessions.

lyrics.text:
Me puse a rapear una vuelta,
que me dejó viendo en cámara lenta,
yo nunca prendo,
pero cuando inventan,
me sale humo escribiendo esta mierda.
El precio aumenta
y no estoy en venta,
montate y graba como en los 90,
mi creatividad es mi herramienta,
la que va a pagar todas mis cuentas.
Esto es así,
la realidad,
90 minutos en la titular,
sin agua y suplencia,
no puedo parar,
lo que yo me he ganado lo supe sudar,
muchos me han tratado de limitar,
y yo de"huevona" que me puse a escuchar,
a mi con mis sueños me van a enterrar,
porque si yo nací es pa´ venir a rapear,
y no tengo problema,
en viajar sin maletas,
he empezado de cero,
ya perdí la cuenta,
mi mente en la meta,
hasta con turbulencia,
convierto en música,
lo que me atormenta,
y cuando yo rapeo,
la gente conecta,
vivo de los fans ,
no de las apariencias,
yeah,
ellos quieren mi receta,
aquí no se lambe,
aquí se josea.
estas rimas paranormales,
los pone tiesos,
trague y exhale,
esto es orgánico
y sobresale,
yo me la paso,
cruzando umbrales,
tengo el balón,
se comió el amague,
yo y esos rappers,
no somos iguales,
no tengo jefes,
 no me regalé,
son placeres casi sexuales.
uuuu,
no saben que hacer porque yo nunca le bajo,
todas las bendiciones siempre las atajo,
yo lo hago por amor,  ustedes por los fajos,
su sonido se quedó estancado.

metadata.name: Heybela Session _ 001 Ft Davyd #1
